column1: When the moves are conflicting at least one minute should be allowed.Example: arrive Platform 1 10.06; depart Platform 3 10.07 or later.Exception when arrival is in Platform 4 from the South, when departures can be at the same time as the arrival.
When the moves are conflicting at least three minutes should be allowed. This also applies for reoccupation of the same platformExample: depart Platform 3 10.27, arrive Platform 2 10.30 or later
